title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Cultural Foundations of Lesson Study (LS) and Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational adult education theory and job-related scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three cultural characteristics of Lesson Study (LS) activities (e.g., practical reasoning, collaborative inquiry).
Learners can analyze a 5-minute LS practice video in a mobile environment and derive at least two key insights.
Learners can establish and share LS-based instructional improvement plans applicable to their own professional fields.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
